headline: Nvidia briefly becomes the first $4 trillion company. How it beat Microsoft and Apple to the crown.
summary: The chip maker’s stock touched an intraday level needed to achieve a $4 trillion market cap, but has since pulled back slightly.

headline: Microsoft’s stock gets an upgrade. Why these analysts say it’s underappreciated in AI.
summary: The sustaining growth of the company’s AI revenue and cloud platform Azure are not fully priced into the stock, Oppenheimer analysts said.
